name: Solhint
about: Solhint is a Solidity linter. A tool that helps solidity devs to write standardized smart contracts code, taking care of code quality, order, readability, style guides, preventing known bugs, and giving security alerts. Has been a pretty popular tool within the Ethereum community. It is also an open source tool considered a public good in the ecossystem.
